name: Amulet of Natural Armor
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Magic Items/Wondrous Items/Amulet of Natural Armor

Construction.Requirements: Craft Wondrous Item, barkskin, creator's caster level must be at least three times the amulet's bonus

sections.body: This amulet, usually crafted from bone or beast scales, toughens the wearer's body and flesh, giving him an enhancement bonus to his natural armor from +1 to +5, depending on the kind of amulet.
sections.name: Description
